body_html: Hi @thiell, I'd recommend taking a look at the cifar10_estimator example instead. The cifar10_multi_gpu_train.py example is out of date, and based on what I've heard from others, it may not work correctly.
body_text: Hi @thiell, I'd recommend taking a look at the cifar10_estimator example instead. The cifar10_multi_gpu_train.py example is out of date, and based on what I've heard from others, it may not work correctly.
body: Hi @thiell, I'd recommend taking a look at the [cifar10_estimator](https://github.com/tensorflow/models/tree/master/tutorials/image/cifar10_estimator) example instead. The cifar10_multi_gpu_train.py example is out of date, and based on what I've heard from others, it may not work correctly.
